name: #02 Welcome to the Jungle!
description:
(Created for the 2021 Cryptex Jam)

Welcome to the Jungle, adventurer!  Can you explore its hidden secrets to find the legendary Fountain of Sleuth?

Written by Brent Mair
Coding by Darren Miller, graphics by Errol Elumir

An illustrated 8-bit adventure game made with Adventuron.
